amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to increase funding to the Electricity Delivery program by $1,000,000 to further facilitate the programs aim to develop a modern power grid by advancing resilient power distribution systems, intelligent and high-efficiency grid components, and energy storage systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Soto.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
